name: BatchOptions
shortdesc: Options to specify when running a Batch command.

property.name: overrideOpen
property.shortdesc: If true, overrides action open commands.

property.name: suppressOpen
property.shortdesc: If true, suppresses file open options dialogs.

property.name: suppressProfile
property.shortdesc: If true, suppresses color profile warnings.

property.name: destination
property.shortdesc: The type of destination for the processed files.

property.name: destinationFolder
property.shortdesc: The folder location for the processed files. Valid only when 'destination' = folder.

property.name: overrideSave
property.shortdesc: If true, overrides save as action steps with the specified destination.

property.name: fileNaming
property.shortdesc: A list of file naming options. Maximum: 6.

property.name: startingSerial
property.shortdesc: The starting serial number to use in naming files.

property.name: windowsCompatible
property.shortdesc: If true, the final file names are Windows compatible.

property.name: macintoshCompatible
property.shortdesc: If true, the final file names are Macintosh compatible.

property.name: unixCompatible
property.shortdesc: If true, the final file names are Unix compatible.

property.name: errorFile
property.shortdesc: The file in which to log errors encountered. To display errors on the screen and stop batch processing when errors occur, leave blank.
